reviews.review: You can beat it in under 30 minutes
游戏可以，剧情也简单，用点脑子就能通关，除了有些地方，手可能会跟不上脑子，不过我手速还行

I liked how through the game you can progress and get faster and then use those tricks and skills in the later levels. This game is very well made. If they didn't show what through the portal looked like I wouldn't have beaten it.  Would for sure recommend to all. :)
Beat it for the third time today. Still as amazing as the first time that I played it. This game is a masterpiece, and I would recommend it to anyone and everyone!
Adamlar yapmış oyunu ya. Hikayesi çok iyi gerçekten değerini hak ediyor.

runs on my 8gb 15 duel processor laptop

Если вы прошли сюжетную компанию Portal, но не прошли усложнённые камеры в Portal, то вы не прошли PORTAL!!! 

Извиняюсь за переизбыток слова PORTAL.
Un jeu très plaisant mais très rapide à finir.
jo digga wer das lest kauf ma
Gutes Spiel, aber ich habe irgendwann einfach keine Errungenschaften mehr bekommen..
se vc ainda n jogou portal ... jogue é mt bom :)
It's Portal man, just buy the game.
공략 없이도 충분히 깰 수 있을 정도의 난이도. 유저가 스스로 게임을 해결할 수 있게끔 신경써서 만든 부분이 돋보이고 엔딩곡이 맛있음.
one of the best and funniest games of all time. It's really short so you could knock it out in a few hours at most
one of my favourite games, 10/10 would reccomend
it is a great game and has a great story line that i love :)
GLAD.OS helped me realize I was a lesbian

I would recommend this game to anyone with 10 bucks and looking for somthing to do, the puzzels are hard, but fun, and when you figure them out you are just marveled by how awesome the last puzzle was, just to me even more impressed by the next. 9.5/10 game some of the challanges are almost unreachable and alot of practice is required, other than that one of the best games

Ez a játék nagy kedvenc volt már akkor is, amikor kijött.
A hideg gépies világba helyezve megkívánja a komplex gondolkodásmódot, hogy megoldd az időnként kissé nehéznek mondható feladványokat a szintről szintre való továbbjutáshoz. 
Kreativitást, probléma megoldó készséget igényel, de rendkívül szórakoztató rájönni a folyamatosan nehezedő megoldásokra, miközben a játékot áthatja a fenyegetettség érzete, míg végül a végső titokra is fény derül.
Aki szereti, ha kötött keretek között,  valamennyi rendelkezésre álló eszközt felfedezve és esetenként felhasználva kell megoldást találnia a továbbjutáshoz, és szívesen próbálkozik alternatív megoldások kikísérletezésével, az egy többször elővehető, ebben a típusban mindig élvezhető játékot nyer.
I'm  the most casual gamer I know. Everybody should play this.
The game is a real treat all around, it has a great dystopian sci-fi aesthetic, great puzzles, engaging story, fun mechanics, and not that long. 10/10 Runes.
Only finished it once and can confirm it is absolute quality, probably going to replay it a bunch of times. :thumbsup:

This is the best game I ever seen

the Story so much good
The graphics very good
While a short game, Portal is a very unique first person puzzle game! This is a must play!
Lots of fun, Great strategy puzzle game - If you haven't tried a portal game give one a go (if you like these sorts of games).
If you exist you must play this game.

短！短！短！3个小时就通关了，要是再快点完全可以直接退款了
这不玩2都不舒服啊啊啊

a short little puzzle game that has good replay ability if you have free time
This game will provide you with a very short but unique, unforgettable, and original experience. I recommend getting it when on sale. Achievements need to be fun and clear.
An excellent game, great gameplay and narrative.
This is a really fun puzzle game that's 100% worth the 10$. Great game with great level design.
Gra dobra dla osób lubiących łamigłówki jednakże nie zajmie dużo czasu aby ją przejść ale myślę że warto ją polecić
Es muy genial, la historia, el inicio de una saga que espera una continuacion. Simplemente genial
игра отличная. Понравиться спидранирам так-как там много багов, хотя чё я говарю
